title: Microsoft Tops Apple as the World's Most Valuable Company
text: LIVE COVERAGE | CONCLUDED Last Updated: Jan. 11, 2024 at 7:58 PM EST Updated 3 months ago By Adam Clark Microsoft’s fully diluted market cap rose to $2.875 trillion in intraday trading, surpassing Apple’s $2.873 trillion valuation. Microsoft Corp. MSFT (U.S.: Nasdaq) Apple Inc. AAPL (U.S.: Nasdaq) Advertisement - Scroll to Continue
